titleStmt.title: Aurea Legenda, or Apothegms, sentences, and sayings of many wise and learned men, useful for all sorts of persons Collected out of many authors by Sa. Clark, sometimes pastor in B.F.
titleStmt.author: Clarke, Samuel, 1599-1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Nathanael Ranew at the King's-Arms in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
